text: thumb Tiruvaikal Vaikalnathar Temple is a Hindu temple located at Mayiladuthurai district of Tamil Nadu, India. The presiding deity is Shiva. He is called as Vaigalnathar (Shenbaga Aranyeswarar). His consort is Kombial Kothai (Shaka Komalavalli). == Significance == It is one of the shrines of the 275 Paadal Petra Sthalams. Thirunavukkarasar have sung hymns in praise of the temple. == References == * * Category:Shiva temples in Mayiladuthurai district Category:Padal Petra Stalam
title: Tiruvaikal Vaikalnathar Temple
